name: Salsify Tailor - Target Schema Generation
description: A Ruby gem for Target Schema generation and utilities. Provides tools for building, validating, and testing Target Schemas programmatically. Includes RSpec matchers for asserting Target Schema properties (field values, required conditions, applicable scopes, max length), a Target Schema Validator, and support for working with workbooks and worksheets. The gem handles field constraints including allowed/disallowed character regexes, GTIN formats, min/max values, decimal places, combined lengths, and number of values.

name: Applicable Scope
description: A Target Schema concept in Salsify Tailor that defines conditions under which a field is applicable. Applicable Scopes support product type filtering (child, parent, or nil), field conditions, multi-conditional scenarios (multiple unrelated criteria), and grouping conditionals. Used to specify when certain fields should be shown or required based on product classification or other field values.

name: Field Condition
description: A Target Schema concept that specifies conditional logic for when a field should be applicable or required. Part of the Applicable Scope system in Salsify Tailor, Field Conditions can include product type and specific field value requirements that must be met for the condition to be satisfied.

name: Target Schema Constraint
description: A validation rule in Salsify Target Schemas that defines requirements for field values. Supported constraint types include: allowed/disallowed character regexes, GTIN format validation (UPC, GTIN8, GTIN12, GTIN13, GTIN14), max/min length, max/min value, max/min number of values, max decimal places, max/min combined length, and relative min/max values. Constraints can be data-type specific and support value paths for compound fields.

name: Target Schema Field
description: A field definition in a Salsify Target Schema. Fields have properties including: external_id, name, description (plain or HTML), data_type (string, enumerated, boolean, digital_asset, number, date, link, compound, html, rich_text, struct), required status, classifier status, parent_id, hidden/read_only flags, applicable_scopes, field_values, requirements (constraints), and position. For packaged templates, fields also support columns, data_formatting, custom_formula, and splitting_setting.

name: Target Schema Workbook
description: A component of Salsify Target Schemas that organizes fields into workbook structures, similar to Excel workbooks. Part of the Salsify Tailor gem's Target Schema generation capabilities, workbooks contain worksheets for organizing and presenting Target Schema fields.

name: Packaged Template Target Schema
description: A special type of Target Schema in Salsify that includes additional metadata for templating. Packaged Templates support columns, data formatting, custom formulas, and splitting settings for fields. The Salsify Tailor gem includes JSON schema definitions for packaged template target schemas.
